action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the freezer, the plate on the side table and the mop on the shelf.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter and a cupboard. The refrigerator is closed. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a sandwich, a banana, a peach and a orange.
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a apple.
You are in a living room now. There are a table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a side table, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
You can't see a plate here.

> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a living room now. There are a table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You can't see a freezer here.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter, a peach, a cupboard, a banana, a sandwich and a orange. The refrigerator is open. The peach is in the refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
You put the apple in the refrigerator.
You are in a pantry now. There are a shelf and a freezer. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
You can't see a apple here.

> go to kitchen
> take apple
> go to pantry
> put apple in freezer

You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter, a peach, a cupboard, a apple, a banana, a sandwich and a orange. The refrigerator is open. The peach is in the refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The apple is in the refrigerator. The banana is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> take apple
> go to pantry
> put apple in freezer
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a apple.

> go to pantry
> put apple in freezer
You are in a pantry now. There are a shelf and a freezer. The freezer is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the apple in the freezer.
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> go to bedroom

You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter, a peach, a cupboard, a banana, a sandwich and a orange. The refrigerator is open. The peach is in the refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> go to living room
> go to bedroom
You are in a living room now. There are a table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.

> go to bedroom
> put plate on side table
You are in a bedroom now. There are a side table, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> go to living room
> go to hallway
You are in a living room now. There are a table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway

You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter, a peach, a cupboard, a banana, a sandwich and a orange. The refrigerator is open. The peach is in the refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You don't need to open the 'broomcloset'.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop
> go to pantry
> put mop on shelf
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.

> go to hallway
> go to pantry
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen and a broom closet here.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry

You are in a kitchen now. There are a refrigerator, a counter, a peach, a cupboard, a banana, a sandwich and a orange. The refrigerator is open. The peach is in the refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> go to pantry
> put mop on shelf
You are in a pantry now. There are a shelf, a apple and a freezer. The apple is in the freezer. The freezer is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the mop on the shelf.
Model produced DONE action at turn 33, end episode.
